name: Bloodbraid

skills.name: Tireless Assault

Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Has a 25% chance of granting an Extra Turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%

skills.name: Lifecurse
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Places a 100% [Heal Reduction] debuff for 2 turns. Heals this Champion by 30% of the damage dealt.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +15%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1
